Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:pepr3d::AddValueCommand
Example command used for debugging purposes of the CommandManager system, adds an integer to IntegerState pepr3d::Geometry::AreaHighlight
A highlight of a part of the Geometry pepr3d::AssetNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a required asset is not found in the assets/ directory pepr3d::AssimpProgress< Progress >
Represents a progress of importing/exporting a model via Assimp pepr3d::ModelView::Attributes
Custom OpenGL attributes pepr3d::Brush
Tool used for painting a model while not being limited by the original triangles pepr3d::BrushSettings
Current settings of the Brush tool pepr3d::Toolbar::ButtonProperties
Properties of a clickable and selectable button in the Toolbar pepr3d::CameraUi
Enables user interaction with a CameraPersp via the mouse pepr3d::SidePane::Category
A category of a SidePane that can be opened and closed by a user pepr3d::CmdColorManagerAddColor
Command that adds a new color to the palette pepr3d::CmdColorManagerChangeColor
Command that changes a color in the palette pepr3d::CmdColorManagerRemoveColor
Command that removes a color from the palette, which replaces it in the Geometry with the first color in the palette pepr3d::CmdColorManagerReorderColors
Command that reorders 2 colors in the palette, which does not change the colors in the Geometry pepr3d::CmdColorManagerResetColors
Command that resets all colors of the palette to the default 4 colors pepr3d::CmdColorManagerSwapColors
Command that swaps 2 colors in the palette, which also swaps the colors in the Geometry pepr3d::CmdPaintBrush
Command that paints a stroke with a brush pepr3d::CmdPaintSingleColor
Command that sets a (same) color to a batch of triangles pepr3d::CmdPaintText
Command that paints a text using orthogonal projection pepr3d::ColorManager
Represents a color palette, i.e., all colors and a selected active color pepr3d::PaintBucket::ColorStopping
A paint bucket criterion that stops on a different color pepr3d::CommandBase< Target >
CommandBase is a base class for commands representing a single undoable operation. The command itself should be an immutable entity, containing only the necessary data to perform the action pepr3d::CommandManager< Target >
CommandManager handles all undoable operations on target in the form of commands See CGAL::Gps_traits_adaptor< Traits_ >::Construct_vertex_2pepr3d::DataTriangle
Custom Triangle type holding the CGAL::Triangle_3 and additional data pepr3d::DataTriangleAABBPrimitive
Provides the conversion facilities between the custom triangle DataTriangle and the CGAL Triangle_3 class. Taken from CGAL/examples/AABB_tree/custom_example.cpp, modified pepr3d::DetailedTriangleId
Triangle ID in all detailed triangles Face index in mMeshDetailed faces; pepr3d::Dialog
Represents a modal dialog shown to a user in the user interface in front of everything else pepr3d::DisplayOptions
Tool used to adjust how the model is displayed pepr3d::PaintBucket::DoNotStop
A paint bucket criterion that never stops, used for coloring the whole model pepr3d::TriangleDetail::ExactTriangle
Exact triangle with colour and polygon information pepr3d::ExportAssistantpepr3d::TriangleDetail::FaceInfo
Used in triangulation to distinguish filled faces from holes pepr3d::FatalLogger
Cinder logger which only logs events with ci::log::Level::LEVEL_FATAL pepr3d::FontRasterizer
Used for triangulating a font outline pepr3d::FontStorage
Keeps pointers to all fonts used in the user interface (regular, small, and icons) pepr3d::Geometry
The whole geometry of a model that the user is painting pepr3d::GeometryProgress
Atomic values representing percentage progress of geometry import, export, and SDF computation pepr3d::Geometry::GeometryStatepepr3d::GeometryUtils
Static utility functions that are not closely tied to Geometry GnuplotDebug< PointType >CGAL::Gps_traits_adaptor< Traits_ >std::hash< pepr3d::DetailedTriangleId >
Hashes a DetailedTriangleId pepr3d::Hotkey
A hotkey, i.e., a keycode and modifiers (Ctrl) pepr3d::HotkeyHasher
Used for hashing a hotkey so it can be put in std::unordered_map pepr3d::Hotkeys
All hotkeys and their corresponding actions pepr3d::ModelExporter::IndexedEdgepepr3d::Geometry::OpenGlData::Info
Always editable struct that keeps track of changes since last frame Updates to color/highlight buffer set this flag to true ModelView resets the flag to false when it updates OpenGl data pepr3d::Information
Tool used for getting details about the application pepr3d::IntegerState
Example state used for debugging purposes of the CommandManager system, contains a single integer pepr3d::LiveDebug
Tool used for real-time debugging purposes pepr3d::MainApplication
The main Cinder-based application, represents a window, handles events, thread pool, active tools, geometry, etc pepr3d::ModelView::MeshDataOverride
Override currently displayed mesh data, making it possibly to change displayed mesh without chaning the geometry itself pepr3d::ModelExporter
Exports Geometry to separate files via Assimp, supports surface export and depth extrusions pepr3d::ModelImporter
Imports triangles and color palette from a model via Assimp pepr3d::ModelView
The main part of the user interface, shows the geometry to the user pepr3d::PaintBucket::NormalStopping
A paint bucket criterion that stops when an angle between normals is too high pepr3d::SemiautomaticSegmentation::NormalStopping
A segmentation criterion that stops when angles of normals are too different pepr3d::Geometry::OpenGlData
All OpenGL buffers of the Geometry CGAL::Gps_traits_adaptor< Traits_ >::Orientation_2pepr3d::PaintBucket
Tool used for coloring whole regions with a single click pepr3d::PolyhedronBuilder< HDS >
Builds a CGAL Polyhedron from triangles pepr3d::PolyhedronData
CGAL Polyhedron data of the Geometry pepr3d::ProgressIndicator
User interface for showing a current progress, contains a spinner and progress bars pepr3d::SemiautomaticSegmentation::SDFStopping
A segmentation criterion that stops when SDF values are too different pepr3d::SdfValuesException
Exception thrown when SDF values cannot be computed pepr3d::Segmentation
Tool used for automatically separating and coloring the model into regions based on the thickness of the model pepr3d::SemiautomaticSegmentation
Tool used for manually expanding specified regions to create a segmentation of the model pepr3d::Settings
Tool used for configuring the color palette and application pepr3d::ExportAssistant::SettingsPerColor
Export settings available for each color pepr3d::SidePane
Right side of the user interface that displays options of the currently selected tool pepr3d::CommandManager< Target >::SnapshotPair
Saved states of the target and commandId after them pepr3d::TriangleDetail::SphereIntersectionVisitorpepr3d::TextEditor
A tool used for painting texts on a model pepr3d::Tool
A base class of all tools that the user can select and manipulate the Geometry and application with them pepr3d::Toolbar
A top part of the user interface that shows a File menu, Undo, Redo, and all tools pepr3d::FontRasterizer::Tripepr3d::TriangleDetail
Represents additional triangles that replace the original one pepr3d::TrianglePainter
Tool used for coloring individual triangles by clicking or dragging the mouse pepr3d::GeometryUtils::TriRayIntVisitor
